% Custom LaTeX Preamble
% Math and science support, graphics, and tables

% Math support
\usepackage{amsmath}
\usepackage{amssymb}
\usepackage{amsfonts}

% Graphics and figures
\usepackage{graphicx}
\usepackage{float}

% Better tables
\usepackage{booktabs}
\usepackage{longtable}
\usepackage{array}

% Hyperlinks (for clickable references in PDF)
\usepackage{hyperref}
\hypersetup{
    colorlinks=true,
    linkcolor=blue,
    filecolor=magenta,
    urlcolor=blue,
}
